alert.note: Alert for Lycoming; Montour; Northumberland; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 5:33AM EDT until July 16 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues, mainly in Muncy Township, Lycoming County. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Lycoming, Montour, Northumberland and Union. * WHEN...Until 730 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams are likely nearing crest, and should begin falling this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 526 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported ongoing flooding across the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Little additional rainfall is expected until this afternoon when thunderstorms are possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montoursville, Muncy, Watsontown, Hughesville, Montgomery, Loyalsockville, Elimsport, and Picture Rocks. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
